title: Android Developer
jobDescription:
We are looking for passionate and curious Android engineers to join our young and ambitious Mobile team at Conde Nast. This role is a unique opportunity to work on greenfield projects and solve new challenges. It is also an unprecedented chance to contribute to the future of Conde Nast digital strategy.

If you thrive on solving interesting problems, positively challenging yourself and building products for millions of readers around the world - wed love to speak with you. We are set to completely redefine Mobile engineering at Conde Nast and you can do it with us.

Role and responsibilities

  • Work within a global cross-functional team including Product, Engineering and Design to define product requirements and deliverables
  • Carry out technical feature analysis and define technical architecture of the product
  • Write code and be part of code and design reviews
  • Exhibit an end-to-end ownership approach
  • Contribute to best engineering practices and principles across your team
  • Identify and improve code and usability performance issues
  • Help us grow and expand our engineering teams
  • Maintain knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architecture, trends, and emerging technologies
  • Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable code.
  • Work with the team to achieve design and implementation of customer facing features.
  • Write unit-test code for robustness, usability, and general reliability.
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
  • Collaborating and pairing. We like knowledge sharing and upskilling
  • Remote-friendly. We work with engineers across time zones locations
  • Iterative development using agile methodologies
  • Kotlin for our mobile applications respectively
  • Java for app development would be an added advantage
  • Firebase - for most of our infrastructure
  • API: GraphQL would be an added advantage
  • MVVM design pattern, Clean Architecture
  • Unit tests and Integration tests using Mockk framework
  • UI testing would be an added advantage
  • Use Detekt for Static Code Analysis
    • You have a BE / BTech or equivalent experience
    • You can work with a global team and are flexible to adjust hours accordingly - preferably UK hours
    • You have released mobile applications to Google App Store
    • You have experience with Kotlin and Android development technologies
    • You have experience managing a CI / CD pipeline for Android
    • You have a solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
    • You have strong analytical and problem solving skills
    • You are generous with your time and expertise and happy to mentor others
    • You are eager to learn about new technologies and implementing these ideas in a production environment
    • You are an effective communicator both verbally and in writing and able to build consensus
    • You are happy to work independently and as part of a team
    • You have strong written and verbal English skills

title: React Native App Developer
jobDescription:
• Develop and maintain mobile applications using React Native framework.
  • Architect, design, and implement mobile applications using React Native, TypeScript, and MobX/Redux.
  • Implement modern UI/UX design principles to deliver visually appealing and user-friendly mobile experiences.
  • Integrate with RESTful APIs for data retrieval and perform asynchronous data handling.
  • Stay updated with the latest React Native versions, changes, and best practices.
  • Collaborate with designers and backend developers to ensure seamless integration of front-end components.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code to ensure long-term viability and scalability of the applications.
  • Contribute to the development, deployment, and management of web and mobile applications across multiple platforms.
Required Qualifications and Skills:
  • Minimum of 3 to 5 years of professional experience in developing mobile applications using React Native.
  • Proficiency in architecting mobile applications using React Native, TypeScript, and MobX/Redux.
  • Experience with modern UI/UX design principles is a strong plus.
  • Proven experience in working with RESTful APIs and handling asynchronous data.
  • In-depth knowledge of React Native, its latest versions, and recent changes.
  • Solid understanding of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and XML.
  • Proficiency in using HTML, CSS, SASS, Tailwind/Bootstrap, JavaScript, SQL, ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, NextJS, and React Native.
  • Master s Degree in a relevant field is preferred.
Benefits:
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Opportunity to work on innovative projects in a collaborative environment.
  • Opportunity to work on multiple projects from a variety of international clients
  • Access to cutting-edge technologies and tools.
  • Professional development and growth opportunities.
  • Friendly and inclusive work culture.
